content.name: cutting_instrument
content.label: Cutting Instrument
content.gloss: an instrument composed of a blade fixed into a handle, used for cutting or as a weapon

content.name: knife
content.label: Knife
content.gloss: an instrument composed of a blade fixed into a handle, used for cutting

content.name: blade_side
content.label: Blade Side
content.gloss: the blade side of a knife/dagger that is usually made of steel and is used to cut or kill things

content.name: handle_side
content.label: Handle Side
content.gloss: the handle side of a knife/dagger that is usually made of wood. plastic and is used to grasp the knife/dagger

content.name: dagger
content.label: Dagger
content.gloss: a knife with a pointed and edged blade, used as a weapon

content.name: handle
content.label: Handle
content.gloss: a handle where human grasp and hold the knife

content.name: guard
content.label: Guard
content.gloss: a part at the very beginning of a knife handle that stops your fingers from sliding forward onto the knife blade and cutting edge

content.name: butt
content.label: Butt
content.gloss: a clear end segment for the knife/dagger handle that stops the graspable region

content.name: fingerhole
content.label: Fingerhole
content.gloss: a hole for figure to grasp through

content.name: blade
content.label: Blade
content.gloss: a flat cutting edge of a dagger or a knife

content.name: scabbard
content.label: Scabbard
content.gloss: a sheath for holding a sword, knife, or other large blade

content.name: bolster
content.label: Bolster
content.gloss: a thick junction between the handle and the knife blade which provides a smooth transition from the blade to the handle
